headline: Berkshire Hathaway’s Mystery Stock Could Be Revealed Thursday. Filings Offer Clues.
summary: Berkshire Hathaway’s  latest mystery-stock investment could be revealed on Thursday.  There is a good chance it is an industrial company.  Berkshire also could disclose that it made further sales of  Bank of America  stock in the second quarter.

headline: AST SpaceMobile jumps 13% premarket amid updated satellite launch cadence
summary: Investing.com -- Shares of AST SpaceMobile (NASDAQ:ASTS) jumped in premarket U.S. trading on Tuesday, as it provided an updated timeline for the launch of the next batch of its BlueBird satellites.

headline: Verizon Gains 6.5% in Six Months: Should You Invest in VZ Stock?
summary: Verizon's 6.5% gain in six months outpaces industry growth as wireless, broadband and retail partnerships fuel momentum.

headline: Trucking Hub Selects 3MD ELD as Preferred FMCSA-Certified, Tamper-Proof Logging Solution
summary: Trucking Hub, an industry-leading provider of Transportation Management System (TMS) software, has named 3MD ELD its preferred electronic logging device for integrated fleet compliance. The decision underscores Trucking Hub's commitment to delivering an FMCSA-certified, tamper-proof ELD engineered for enterprise reliability, seamless TMS integration, and continuous fleet connectivity.
